import React, { useState } from 'react' import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' function ProjectForm({ users, postProject, history, edit, editProject, projectId, errors }) { const [state, setstate] = useState({ projectName: undefined, description: "whack", startDate: undefined, targetEndDate: undefined, }) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() switch (e.target.name) { case "create": postProject(state) break case "edit": editProject(projectId, state) history.go(0) break } } const userOptions = users.map((user, i) => ( )) const handleChange = (e) => { setstate({ ...state, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } return (
{ edit ? "Edit Project" : "Create Project"}
{edit ?
:
}
) } export default withRouter(ProjectForm)
